bug.author: sbhttchryy
bug.summary: Using question_answering_crossvalidation.py on the COVID-QA data fails
bug.description: Hello developers. I tried to run the question_answering_crossvalidation.py on the COVID-QA data (<denchmark-link:https://github.com/deepset-ai/COVID-QA/blob/master/data/question-answering/COVID-QA.json>https://github.com/deepset-ai/COVID-QA/blob/master/data/question-answering/COVID-QA.json</denchmark-link> ) and it did not work. It gave the error : assert datasilo.tensor_names[4] == "id", f"Expected tensor 'id' at index 4, found {datasilo.tensor_names[4]}" AssertionError: Expected tensor 'id' at index 4, found passage_start_t

comments.comment: Hey <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sbhttchryy>@sbhttchryy</denchmark-link> I could not reproduce the issue on current FARM master. I also remember we changed these tensor indices some while ago to be correct, so could you update your FARM version and try again?
Any updates on this <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sbhttchryy>@sbhttchryy</denchmark-link> ? Does the error persist when using the current FARM master?
Seems inactive and hopefully solved. Closing for now, feel free to reopen if the error persists.
